page.title: 08Penkill Castle
page.content: Penkill Castle was built in{1470 A.D. just after the reign of {Robert the {Bruce.} It was a Scot's keep,with the door about halfway up the wall and the only way in was by rope.On three sides of the castle the ground drops down steeply which was good for defence.The only side that you could attack from was the front entrance and that was well defended because of small slits in the walls from which archers shot their arrows. The old part of the castle has three wings,and a tower was built in{1857}to join the wings.There is a stone statue of an{owl which is about two feet tall sitting on the roof of the banquet hall and there are more inside.These are known as the castles symbols.
